package.name: motoman_gp225_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Motoman GP225.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman GP225 series of manipulators..
Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in YASKAWA MOTOMAN-GP225,GP180,GP180-120 INSTRUCTIONS (HW1484398) version 182739-1CD, rev 5.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
NOTE: the base model xacro macro has all joints oriented such that they rotate around the Z+ axis. As a consequence, link frames in this model do not follow REP-103 wrt frame orientation.

package.author: Eric Marcil
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
